reviews.comments: Muy hermosas y cómodas las cabañas, espectacular el predio y la pileta, y excelente la atención de sus dueños. Completamente recomendables. ¡Muchas gracias Daniel y Luciana!
Excelente ubicación, un lugar para descansar y disfrutar. Los anfitriones muy atentos y el complejo es hermoso.
Muy lindo lugar y alojamiento, servicios y hospitalidad. Parrilla y pileta disponible muy buena, confort y posibilidad de cocinar. YA LO RECOMENDAMOS...!

Nos alojamos una semana en la cabaña y estuvimos muy cómodos, Daniel y Luciana estuvieron siempre atentos a que no nos falte nada y nos recomendaron lugares para recorrer. La zona es muy tranquila, esta cerca del centro. De volver seguramente nos alojaríamos nuevamente con ellos. Yanina y Diego.
Un lugar muy bonito, tranquilo y óptimo para descansar.

La cabaña de Daniel y Luciana esta genial !! Cuando llegamos ... muy tarde a la noche, nos esperaron con la habitación calentita y las cosas para el desayuno !! Estuvimos comunicados todo el tiempo y nos ayudaron con los paseos. Una pareja divina y bien merecido el súper host!!

Nuestra estadía fue muy cortita, pero nos encantó el lugar. Las fotos reflejan exactamente como son las cabañas. El lugar se encuentra muy cerca, 20min caminando, del centro. Nosotros fuimos en colectivo a Carlos Paz y se nos hizo muy fácil llegar de la terminal a la cabaña. 
La atención fue excelente. Estamos muy agradecidos por dejarnos haber tenido la oportunidad de disfrutar el lugar.
reviews.response: Chicos gracias por visitarnos. Los esperamos cuando gusten. Abrazo!!!

reviews.comments: Muy linda la cabaña, cómoda, cerca del centro pero con mucha tranquilidad. Daniel es un buen anfitrión que estuvo siempre que lo necesitamos.
reviews.response: Ariel: Gracias por visitarnos.  Esperamos volver a tenerlos como huéspedes.

reviews.comments: Muy cordiales los anfitriones :), buena ubicacion, el lugar esta limpio y sus perritas son un amor.

El lugar es excelente, tanto por su atención como por la comodidad que presenta la cabaña y la posibilidad que brinda de poder disfrutar la naturaleza y la tranquilidad de Carlos Paz, además destaco la cercanía para poder movilizarse hacia zonas más céntricas.
Daniel & Luciana son muy amables predispuestos en todo momento.
Disfrutamos de una linda estadía! Esperamos volver en otra oportunidad.
reviews.response: Gracias Chicos!!! esperamos volver a tenerlos como huéspedes en nuestras cabañas.

reviews.comments: Excelente experiencia! Daniel y Luciana muy buenos anfitriones. Nos sentimos como en casa! La cabaña muy linda, lugar tranquilo, perfecto para descansar.

Todo excelente! El lugar hermoso, la pileta impecable y la cabaña muy limpia. Ellos, super atentos y amables. No hay duda de que si vuelvo a Villa Carlos Paz me hospedaré con Daniel y Luciana. Muchas gracias por todo!
reviews.response:
Chicos: un placer tenerlos como huéspedes!! esperamos verlos nuevamente.

Les dejamos saludos y muy felices viajes!!!

reviews.comments: La cabaña es muy comoda. Muy bien ubicada.  Nos sentimos como en casa. Muy amables Daniel y su sra. Lo recomendamos!!!
reviews.response:
Gracias chicos por visitarnos !!!!!
Esperamos volver a verlos.

reviews.comments: No se pudo concretar la estadía por un desencuentro con el anfitrion.
reviews.response: Tienes crédito de  una noche en nuestras cabañas. recuerda contactarnos para definir la resolución del desencuentro!! Saludos!!!!!

reviews.comments: El lugar es muy bonito, bien ambientado y la cabaña muy cómoda. Los anfitriones se han mostrado muy atentos y cordiales en todo momento.
reviews.response: Gracias Ane!!! los esperamos en cualquier otra oportunidad!!!

reviews.comments: Daniel y Luciana son amables y generosos anfitriones. Disfruté de mi estancia, fue relajante y tranquilo, y lo recomiendo encarecidamente.

Tuvimos tres maravillosos días en Villa Carlos Paz. La cabaña (que es muy linda y confortable) está cerca del centro y del Lago Roque pero - por suerte - en una parte no tan turística del pueblo. La familia de Daniel vive en la casa de al lado y nos ayudó en cualquier caso. Nos hicieron posible dos cabalgatas fantásticas, nos mostraron el asado argentino en su casa, incluso nos ayudaron en planear el viaje siguiente. Pues: Disfrutamos mucho del tiempo allá. El precio también es muy justo. A recomendar!
Très bon accueil , gentillesse et convivialité. MERCI a Luciana et Daniel pour ces bons conseils et disponibilité.Semaine de calme dans un cadre sympathique et naturel.Parfait

The hosts were lovely and very helpful.  The location is a bit secluded but the town is not that big so it is quite walkable. We were able to walk into downtown with no problems.  Everything was as described and the dogs were very friendly.
reviews.response: Thank you !!! You are welcome any time!!!

reviews.comments:
This was our second time staying with Daniel and Luciana.  Clearly, I loved our first stay.  As before, they made us feel welcome by greeting us our first morning there and chatting with us here and there.  I totally spaced and forgot to bring an electrical adaptor, but Daniel had me covered!  If you need something and Daniel is not around, you can always communicate with him via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN).

Daniel and Luciana make a point of saying goodbye when you're checking out, asking how everything was.  They also give hugs upon checkout.  Seriously.  I love staying with them.

The neighborhood is really mellow, not to mention pretty.  We never had any problems in the neighborhood, even when walking back from the night clubs at 5am.  The cabaña is located very close to the old downtown area, and an extra 2 blocks from the new downtown area.  It's also very close to the river and La Costanera.  Cabs as well as the bus terminal are also walking distance.
reviews.response:
Adam & Caro : We are really grateful that we have chosen to stay again . Our best wishes to you .
Adam & Caro: realmente estamos agradecidos por que nos hayan elegido nuevamente para hospedarse.  Nuestros mejores deseos para ustedes.

reviews.comments: We had a really pleasent stay at Daniel&Luciana's bungalow. We would fully recommend it to anyone.

We absolutely loved staying with Daniel and Luciana.  We mostly interacted with Daniel, but I did get to meet Luciana as well.  They were both very nice, and always available to help with anything we needed.  They live on the property and are always available via (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN), airbnb or if you just knock on their door.

Both Daniel and Luciana were very welcoming as well.  They even gave hugs to my girlfriend and I when were checking out.  :D

The Cabana itself was AWESOME!  In any other place, my trip to Carlos Paz would have been so different.  I'm so glad we found this cabana and were able to stay here.  We fully intend on coming back to stay again when I return to Carlos Paz (hopefully in a couple of months).

As far as details go, there's nothing else I could have asked for.  There is a pool on the property--a gorgeous property, I might add--which we made good use of.  The cabana is very comfortable, with a nice bed upstairs and a small kitchen area downstairs.  There is a heating + A/C unit in the bed room that is remote-controlled.  There are more than enough dishes/utensils to handle whatever dining needs you might have, etc.  The refrigerator has plenty of space.  Like I said, there was nothing else I could think to ask for.  On top of that, it's a short and pleasant walk to the downtown area, where there are lots of shops, restaurants, buses, etc.

This was a completely wonderful week, from the moment I arrived. Actually, from before my arrival, because Daniel kept in touch all the time, and then came to Cordoba bus station to give me a lift to the cabañas.
Daniel and Luciana were very thoughtful and kind, inviting me to dinner with them during the week, helping me with laundry, advising me on the area, cooking a fantastic breakfast every day, and making me fresh bread. They were warm and welcoming in every way.
The cabaña is just as described, and is a very clean and simple - and rather stylish - way to spend a relaxing week. All the amenities worked well, from a great shower, to heated air conditioning, to fast internet.
I can't recommend the experience enough; most of all, Daniel and Luciana were friendly, charming, kind and generous.

Unas palabras en español: me gustó muchisimo toda la semana - entonces, más que los 7 días porque Daniel fue siempre listo para comunicar antes y mientras la semana. 
La cabaña fue limpia y elegante, sencilla y funcional. Internet fue rapido, la ducha fue caliente y grande, y cuando el día estuvo frio afuera la cabaña estuvo rapidamente caliente adentro .
Daniel y Luciana son muy amables, generosos, y atentos. Me invitáron cenar con ellos, y siempre fueron listos para ayudarme.
reviews.response: Tim: we are very tankful that you have been our guest.

reviews.comments:
We spent a really nice time in the cabanas of Luciana and Daniel! They have created a small paradise in their backyard in which you can enjoy your time. We also liked Carlos Paz and its surroundings in general - definitely a place to visit.
Last but not least, this is one of not too many places in the area (that we know of), where the hosts are speaking english. So if your spanish is just sufficient to order a couple of beers, got for Luciana and Daniel!
reviews.response: We really appreciate your comment very much. Thank you very much for choosing us. You will always be welcome.

reviews.comments:
It was a great experience and we extended our stay from 10 days to 2 weeks. The cabaña was really comfortable and the way that Daniel has designed and built the pool/cabaña area is really fantastic. The location is good in that it is close to the centre without being crowded and noisy, and you can take excursions out of the city without getting into traffic. The small walk up the hill to reach the location from the centre does become laborious however.

Daniel and his family are a pleasure and were always a around should you need something, and even offered us more without us needing to ask. We had no problems getting into or out of the property 24hrs. There were 2 friendly dogs who are clearly very much in love with each other.

It was difficult to cook properly in the  cabaña kitchen due to the very few utensils available there. However on the occasions we asked for anything, we received. The wifi signal did not generally reach the cabaña and could be improved. A cleaner comes roughly every 3 days and so the place is generally immaculate and fresh sheets and towels are often provided.

Should I ever return to Carlos Paz I would of course want to stay again, and see what New improvements Daniel has built by then. Thank you!
reviews.response:
Bruno:

Gracias por  visitarnos! Mejoraremos la señal de wifi, y pondremos mas utensilios para los aficionados  a la cocina como Uds.
Realmente una muy buena experiencia tenerlos como huéspedes.

Best regards 
Daniel & Luciana.

reviews.comments:
Sehr nette, gemütliche Unterkunft. Voll ausgestattete Küche. Umgeben vom Grün des Gartens und dem Pool. Alles was das Familienherz begehrt. 
Unsere Gastgeber sind obernett und freundlich, sehr hilfsbereit und haben gute Tipps für Ausflüge. Wir haben uns sehr wohl gefühlt und hatten mit der Reitstunde ein Highlight unserer Reise :-)

Perfact! Amazing! Top level!, this is magic place to be , everthing in the bongalow was new , very very cool and big room!! and all the things you need are there! , The house is neer everthing in the city, supermarket, shops , and more..
vila carlos paz is a cool city everyone in every age can find what to do there..sports( runing, football, gym, vollyball and more... , art (museum) , fun( horse riding, omega ) , so time fly very fast....
But for me the best thing is: daniel &luciana & victoria , amazing famly!!!!  Thanks for let me feel at home when i was travel far away from home...you are the true and best argentina and it was honor to meet you, i got  t–shirt so i am offical member in the club...
you will allways stay in my hart, god bless you!
stay in this caza , book now!! 
I know i will came back....
reviews.response:
Roy Tankyou  very much. !!!
Your welkome eny time.
Best regards.
We will hope see you.

reviews.comments: I made reservation for this place by accident as I thought that it was in Cordoba city and I am GLAD that I did as I got not only the place to stay BUT also NEW FRIENDS.  Hosts are WONDERFUL PEOPLE.  Poor Daniel waited for me at the bus station for an hour and half (until midnight) and then took me to the "Cabana" where I had the best sleep since I came to Argentina (four months ago).  "Cabana" was SPOTLESS.  Everything worked as suppose to and when there was some kind of difficulty Daniel was there to fix it.  Daniel is extremely hard working, good family man who was more than willing to do anything for me.  From the first day the family "adopted me" and made me feel as a part of the family.  We cooked, cleaned, played, worked and ate together.  They also took me with them to their friend's b-day celebration where everybody also was very friendly and welcoming. My hosts were so generous and kind that they never let me go anywhere by myself, but rather drove me where ever I wanted to go or just made a day trip for all of us to go on and enjoy together. I had lots of fun sharing my knowledge of psychology with Luciana who is a new professional in our field.  Luciana even took me to THE BEST HAIRDRESSER that I have seen in YEARS - THANK YOU LU :-)
reviews.response:
Suzane you are welcome !!! Our home is your home from today  and forever!!!

We are glad to have met you. 

Best Regards  Luciana & Daniel.

reviews.comments: Daniel, Luciana and their wonderful daughter are the loveliest family ever, they made me feel very welcome and were super helpful especially with the horseriding! I loved staying in their cabin which is very cool. I totally recommend anyone stay here as it´s peaceful and unique! Thankyou so much for everything!
reviews.response:
Thank you Alison!!!!  Our best regards for you!!!
 You´re welcome anytime!!!!
